amp.admin.ndd:title: NDD Manager
amp.admin.ndd:click-save: Click the Save icon to save the added data row
amp.admin.ndd:confirm-remove-row: Are you sure you want to remove this mapping? (remember to click Save All button to confirm your changes).
amp.admin.ndd:validation_error_1: Error: Can't save changes until all programs have been selected.
amp.admin.ndd:validation_error_2: Error: Indirect indicators can't be mapped more than one time.
amp.admin.ndd:warning_on_change_main_pro: If you change the Primary Program or the Indirect Program the existing mappings will be deleted, are you sure you want to continue?
amp.admin.ndd:validation_error_5: Error: Primary Program and Indirect Program must be different.
amp.admin.ndd:warning_on_change_indirect: Warning: The new Indirect Program will be removes from all activities.
amp.admin.ndd:confirm-change-indirect-pr: Are you sure you want to : The new Indirect Program will be removes from all activities.
